com.vangav.backend.push_notifications.apple

Class AppleNotificationSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.push_notifications.apple.AppleNotificationSender

  • public class AppleNotificationSender
extends java.lang.Object
    AppleNotificationSender handles sending AppleNotification Objects to Apple devices through Apple Push Notification Server Handles one app per instance Uses pushy lib to handle sending/response operations --> https://github.com/relayrides/pushy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AppleNotificationSender.ClientType 
      static class  AppleNotificationSender.NotificationStatus
      NotificationStatus is used to tell the status of sending an Apple's push notification

                        throws java.lang.Exception
        NOTE: in case values in apple_notification_properties.prop are set and should be used, then use the singleton method i () instead Constructor AppleNotificationSender
        Parameters:
        certificatePath - (relative path to the certificate file.p12 provided by Apple)
        certificatePassword -
        clientType -
        topic: - is the value of UID in the subject your APNs certificate. It begin's with com.apple.mgmt.

        java.lang.Exception
